properties.entry: INSERT INTO SH_INFO ( SH_NO , SH_TITLE , SH_TYPE , SH_STR , SH_AREA , SH_FLOOR , SH_INTRO , SH_PERS , SH_COMS , SH_SS , SH_ADDRESS , SH_LA , SH_LO , SH_BANK , SH_MART , SH_PARMACY , SH_SUBWAY , SH_CAFE , SH_STORE , SH_STATUS , SH_DATE , PAY_NO ) VALUES ( 'SH' || SH.nextval , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , 'PY1' )
